title: Jonah Goldberg: Defending "Conservatism" in the Trump Era
description: Chuck Todd sits down with conservative columnist Jonah Goldberg to talk about the effect that the Trump Presidency will have on what it means to be a Conservative Republican.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
